chatbot.messageText: If you ever need to mute yourself, you can click on the microphone icon @showcards(mic) in the bottom left corner of the screen. You can interrupt me by clicking on the hand button.@hidecards(mic)

elements.text: Your card will ship via US Mail and should arrive within 7 business days. It will be in a plain envelope with no Citi markings.
elements.tooltip: Your card will ship via US Mail and should arrive within 7 business days. It will be in a plain envelope with no Citi markings.

elements.text: <ul><li>Dont forget to provide your new card information to merchants who auto-bill your card and any apps that have your card on file. Any mobile wallet apps youre enrolled in will be updated automatically.</li></ul>
elements.tooltip: Dont forget to provide your new card information to merchants who auto-bill your card and any apps that have your card on file. Any mobile wallet apps youre enrolled in will be updated automatically.

elements.text: <ul><li>Your replacement card has the same number and a new expiration date. You can continue using your current card until you receive and activate the replacement.</li></ul>

elements.text: To learn more about Damage & Theft Purchase Protection for your credit card, you can go to the Card Benefits page or call 1-800-732-6000 to speak with a Benefit Specialist. (For TTY, we accept 711 or other Relay Servic.)
